fullName: On-duty pharmacies: The evaluation panel should appear when the user hits the 'Puanla' (Rate) or 'Bildir' (Report)

labels.name: story
labels.value: The evaluation panel should appear when the user hits the 'Puanla' (Rate) or 'Bildir' (Report)

labels.name: testClass
labels.value: The evaluation panel should appear when the user hits the 'Puanla' (Rate) or 'Bildir' (Report)

name: The evaluation panel should appear when the user hits the 'Puanla' (Rate) or 'Bildir' (Report)
description: button and disappear when the user hits the 'Kapat' (Close) button.

steps.name: Given  Navigate to the service "On-Duty Pharmacy"
Given  Click on the button PuanlaBildir
And  Verify that the evaluation panel has opened
And  click on the button Kapat
Then  Verify that the panel has disappeared
